plotText.plainText: When one lavish wedding ends in disaster before it can even begin--with a body discovered in Nantucket Harbor just hours before the ceremony--everyone in the wedding party is suddenly a suspect.

After a family tragedy, three generations of the Deetz family return home to Winter River. Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydia's life is turned upside down when her teenage daughter, Astrid, accidentally opens the portal to the Afterlife.

titleCertificate.ratingReason: Rated PG-13 for violent content, macabre and bloody images, strong language, some suggestive material and brief drug use.

originalTitleText.text: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power

titleText.text: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power

plotText.plainText: Epic drama set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings' follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared re-emergence of evil to Middle-earth.
An ex-Marine grapples his way through a web of small-town corruption when an attempt to post bail for his cousin escalates into a violent standoff with the local police chief.

description.value: Watch free on The Roku Channel
Watch free on The Roku Channel

plotText.plainText: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.
A modern-day contemporary retelling of Greek mythology.
A family is invited to spend a whole weekend in a lonely home in the countryside, but as the weekend progresses, they realize that a dark side lies within the family who invited them.

titleCertificate.ratingReason: Rated R for some strong violence, language, some sexual content and brief drug use.

plotText.plainText: Follows a team of British intelligence agents who serve as a dumping ground department of MI5 due to their career-ending mistakes.
Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
Deadpool is offered a place in the Marvel Cinematic Universe by the Time Variance Authority, but instead recruits a variant of Wolverine to save his universe from extinction.

titleCertificate.ratingReason: Rated R for strong bloody violence and language throughout, gore and sexual references.
